title.en: The Prophet Isaiah Speaks of a Coming Child

en: Centuries after King David, the prophet Isaiah speaks to a troubled nation.
He describes a child who will be given as a sign and whose rule will bring peace.

lines: Therefore the Lord himself will give you a sign:
The virgin will be with child
and will give birth to a son,
For to us a child is born,
to us a son is given,
and the government will be on his shoulders.
Of the increase of his government and peace

question.en: What stands out to you about the child described here—and the names that are given to him?
